title: SolarfiX India ropes in Japan-based Kanemasa for solar module manufacturing in India
description: SolarfiX India has partnered with Japan's Kanemasa to build 10 GW solar module capacity in India by 2030. The project will be implemented in phases across Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, and Rajasthan. The memorandum of understanding was signed at the Renewable Energy India Expo 2024. Over 800 exhibitors and key stakeholders are participating in the event.
